amendment.description: To ensure the proper implementation of the rural Western water program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4981 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4981 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 4979. (consideration: CR S5435; text: CR S5435) To ensure the proper implementation of the rural Western water program.
